cont.entity_b: High quality and durable, lasting decades. Expensive.

cont.entity_a: Holds up well under heavy use and exposure to elements. Needs replacement for better durability. Handles and strap clips are poorly designed and uncomfortable.
cont.entity_b: Zippers are durable but can fail over time. Well constructed with a plastic base for durability.

Storage.comm: The bag holds a lot of tools.

cont.entity_a: Large with plenty of storage capacity. Numerous pockets for tool organization.

Weight.comm: The bag is heavy when filled.

cont.entity_a: Large size makes it heavy when fully loaded.

Versatility.comm: The bag is versatile and suitable for various professions.

cont.entity_a: The shoulder strap is weak and needs replacement for better durability.
cont.entity_b: The shoulder strap is comfortable for carrying.
The bag is made in China, not the USA as some may expect.
